lyrics:
4 contributorsgonna wanna tonight lyricsverse 1
if you wanna climb a ladder on a water tower
then well kick it with the stars for a couple hours
if you wanna then were gonna get way up high
if you wanna dip your toes where the water stops
then well let our feet hang off a fishin dock
if you wanna then were gonna have to give it a try thats right

prechorus
if you wanna go way out where there aint nobody around
and let your long hair get to fallin down
and let your red lips leave their mark all over mine

if you wanna then were gonna girl
i hope youre gonna wanna tonight
if you wanna then were gonna girl
i hope youre gonna wanna all night

verse 2
if you wanna catch a buzz and ride it til the mornin
lets get two plastic cups and baby ill get to pourin
i dont really matter if its whiskey or wine its fine

prechorus
if you wanna go way out where there aint nobody around
and let your long hair get to fallin down
and let your red lips leave their mark all over mine
see chase rice liveget tickets as low as 109you might also likefill up the night air with the radio
and put your hands wherever they wanna go
yeah were right there
girl just close your eyes

chorus
if you wanna then were gonna girl
i hope youre gonna wanna tonight
if you wanna then were gonna girl
i hope youre gonna wanna all night

gonna wanna get a little closer
gonna wanna slide it on over
gonna wanna

gonna wanna go way out where there aint nobody around
and let your long hair get to fallin down
and let your red lips leave their mark all over mine

come on
fill up the night air with the radio
and put your hands wherever they wanna go
yeah were right there
